name: Vibhav Misra
profile: Data Scientist with a strong foundation in data analysis, machine learning, and artificial intelligence. Proficient in Python and adept at designing and deploying machine learning models to deliver data-driven solutions. Experienced in tackling complex challenges and collaborating with teams to implement impactful strategies across diverse industries.

education.institution: Pace University, Seidenberg School of Computer Science and Information Systems

education.degree: BE in Computer Science with specialization in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
education.institution: Chandigarh University, Apex Institute of Technology

virtual_experience.program: Data Science Job Simulation via Forage
details: Scraped and analyzed over 1,000 customer reviews using sentiment analysis techniques.
Built a predictive model using Random Forest to identify key booking factors with 85% accuracy.

projects.title: Forecasting Amazon Review Ratings
highlights: Conducted time series analysis to forecast product review trends.
LSTM achieved lowest RMSE of 0.07, outperforming others.
Engineered features, handled seasonality, and visualized trends.

projects.title: Electric Vehicle Adoption Analysis in Washington State
highlights: Analyzed 200,000+ records from Washington State’s open data.
Identified patterns by make, model, location, and policy impact.

projects.title: Comparative Study of Decision Tree and Random Forest Models
highlights: Built and tuned models on Digits dataset.
Compared with Decision Tree and used confusion matrix for evaluation.

projects.title: BioML
highlights: Built a disease prediction web app with 90% validation accuracy.
Led a team of 4 and developed the UI + predictive backend.
Deployed app on GitHub with real-time prediction capability.

projects.title: Detecting Phishing Websites using Machine Learning
highlights: Created a phishing detection app with 85% accuracy.
Built real-time interface and compared multiple algorithms.

certifications: Mathematics for Machine Learning and Data Science Specialization – Coursera (October 2023)
academic_achievements: Pilot batch member of IIT Madras Online BSc in Programming & Data Science.
Completed Foundational Level (8 courses, 32 credits) – CODE, IIT Madras.
Started Diploma Level (Machine Learning, Business Analytics, etc.), transitioned to MS in USA before completion.
